text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Neon dreams come alive tonight
Dancing shadows in the glow
Feel the rhythm start to grow

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat racing in the air
Every step takes us somewhere
In a world where we belong
Life's a never-ending song

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
We lose our way
Forever chasing
What we can't say
Lost in the moment
We find our track
In endless motion
No turning back

[Verse 3]
Echoes of the midnight call
Whispers rise and then they fall
Skies stretch out in endless blue
Every star belongs to you

[Bridge]
The night is young
So are we
Hold on tight to your dreams
Time is slipping through our hands
Let's just live while we can

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
We lose our way
Forever chasing
What we can't say
Lost in the moment
We find our track
In endless motion
No turning back
title: Lost in the Moment
